title: Junior NLP Engineer
description: Work on natural language processing pipelines, entity recognition, and classification tasks. Implement models and help deploy them.

title: Frontend Engineer (React)
description: Develop SPAs using React, build reusable components, work with REST APIs and improve UX.

title: Data Scientist
description: Design predictive models, perform feature engineering and data pipelines, communicate results to stakeholders.

title: Backend Engineer (Python)
description: Build and maintain backend services, REST APIs, and databases. Optimize performance and ensure reliability.
